subject: Re: Compatibility question for 4.5
msgSnippet: Hey all, Keeping the current version for another release would be really handy for us if at all possible.  Thanks for asking! -phil ... retained
messageBody:
Hey all,

Keeping the current version for another release would be really handy
for us if at all possible. Thanks for asking!


-phil


--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "Kent Beck" <kentb@...> wrote:
>
> All,
>
> We are nearing the release of JUnit 4.5. We have a question for all you
> custom runner writers out there. We have substantially restructured the
> internals of JUnit4TestRunner. Would you like the current version
retained
> for at least one more release or shall we discard it?
>
> Regards,
>
> Kent Beck
> Three Rivers Institute
>
